articles.content: CD Projekt Red have denied claims made by a supposed anonymous member of the Cyberpunk 2077 development team, which included the claim that they’re planning a huge No Man’s Sky-esque “comeback” revam… [+2339 chars]

articles.title: Couple sell their home and all their possessions to live and work in a souped-up school bus - Daily Mail
articles.description: Gianna and Jake Bachowski, from Sarasota, Florida, longed for a more nomadic lifestyle and, after discovering a community of families living in converted vans online, decided to follow suit.
